scripts.prepare-test-server: NODE_ENV=test DISABLE_LOGGING=true node -r dotenv-safe/config -e 'require(`execa`)(`start-server-and-test`, [`start`, `http-get://localhost:${process.env.PORT}/admin`, process.argv[1]], { stdio: `inherit` }).catch(error => { console.error(error.toString()); process.exit(error.code) })'
scripts.cypress:run:
if [ -f .env ]; then yarn prepare-test-server cypress:run:cmd; else echo "
Error: Must create a projects/basic/.env file.
See projects/basic/.env.example for values
"; exit 1; fi
scripts.cypress:open:
if [ -f .env ]; then yarn prepare-test-server cypress:open:cmd; else echo "
Error: Must create a projects/basic/.env file.
See projects/basic/.env.example for values
"; exit 1; fi
